wobani.rendering

Class ScreenRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.rendering.Renderer
      • wobani.rendering.ScreenRenderer

  • public class ScreenRenderer
extends Renderer
    Renders the rendering pipeline's final frame to a fullscreen quad.
